snippet: The film magnate Harvey Weinstein has overhauled the creative team for his planned production of “Finding Neverland,” hiring Diane Paulus to direct the project.
abstract: The film magnate Harvey Weinstein has overhauled the creative team for his planned production of “Finding Neverland,” hiring Diane Paulus to direct the project.

headline.main: Harvey Weinstein Finds a New Director for 'Finding Neverland'
headline.print_headline: Weinstein Finds New Director for ‘Finding Neverland’
